scripts.test:run: npm run allure:clean && cucumber-js --parallel 4 && npm run allure:report
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run allure:clean && npm-run-all --continue-on-error test:chrome test:firefox test:webkit && npm run allure:report
scripts.test:all-browsers:parallel: npm run allure:clean && npm-run-all --parallel --continue-on-error test:chrome test:firefox test:webkit && npm run allure:report
scripts.test:ci: cross-env HEADLESS=true BROWSER=chromium npm run test:run
scripts.allure:clean:report: npm run allure:clean && npm run allure:report
scripts.allure:report:open: npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
